services:
Flat roofs
We specialize in flat roofs!

Our services include full flat roof installation, repairs and maintenance. 

Flat roofing materials used are TPO, EPDM and Modified Bitumen.

 
Shingles
Our services include full shingle roof replacements, repairs and maintence.  We deal with a variety of shingles including asphalt, cedar and slate.  
Our team will take the utmost care to make  sure your property is well protected during any demolition and will ensure the job site is cleared of any and all debris.
 
Troughs, fascia & siding
We specialize in seamless Troughs!
We can install or repair eavestroughs, downpipes, soffit and fascia.
We also do siding installation!

We also do siding including new installation, replace existing siding or repair a portion.


Roof repairs
We provide roof leak services for flat roofs including TPO, EPDM and Modified Bitumen.
We also provide roof leak services for shingle roofs - asphalt, cedar and slate.
Temporary roof leak solutions can also be arranged!
Gutter guard
 We provide gutter guard installation.
Stop ice and snow from accumulating on your roof by having us install a de-icing/heating cable. 
Gutter guard is an easy and cost effective way to keep leaves from piling up in your trough and downpipes.
Roof top decks
Do you have unused space on your flat roof?  
Why not utilize the area and have a brand new deck installed.

We can also remove your old deck and replace it with a new one.

We offer a variety of deck styles!
